sentences.en: At the beginning of her school days, Helen was rapt in classical music.

sentences.en: Glaucus was the most rapt and the least inclined to break the silence.
sentences.cn: 格劳科斯听得非常入神,很不愿意打破这沉默.

sentences.en: He had held his audience rapt.
sentences.cn: 他令听众们都听入了迷。

sentences.en: He was rapt in admiration of that young lady.
sentences.cn: 他对这位少女真是崇拜得五体投地.

sentences.en: I noticed that everyone was watching me with rapt attention.
sentences.cn: 我注意到大家都在专注地看着我。

sentences.en: Nim sensed, among his audience, rapt and immediate interest.
sentences.cn: 尼姆意识到听众中顿时产生一种着了迷似的兴趣.

sentences.en: They strike me as changed and rapt beyond my sphere.

sentences.en: This spectacle of another's suffering and sacrifice rapt my thoughts from exclusive meditation on my own.
sentences.cn: 看到别人的痛苦和牺牲,使我的思想不再完全沉浸在自己的痛苦和牺牲上.
